pages.name: Entry Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/tycoon_rider_core_id)Kamen Rider Tycoon Core ID$(/l)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Tycoon
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver_tycoon)Desire Driver (Tycoon)$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Luck

pages.name: Ninja Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/ninja_raise_buckle)Ninja Buckle$(/l) (use in your off-hand to switch sides)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Tycoon
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver_tycoon)Desire Driver (Tycoon)$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Desire Driver user apart from $(l:geats/riders/xgeats)XGeats$(/l) and $(l:geats/riders/dooms_geats)Dooms Geats$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Luck$(br2)Ninja Buckle Effects:$(li)Speed III$(li)Haste II$(li)Jump Boost V
